name: Tanelia Matthews
text: Every single visit always results in me sitting for extended periods of time even with an established appointment time. I think that it’s highly inconsiderate to not respect the patients’ time. Patients are often told to reschedule if they are more than 15 minutes late. How about if you are not called back within 15 minutes of your scheduled appointment time, then patients reschedule for the office to receive their insurance/self-pay money??? There needs to be a better strategy to the scheduling of this facility, so that every patient receives the appropriate care while having their time respected, as well. Everyone does not have 3+ hours of time to sit and wait for a simple doctor’s appointment.

name: Lauren Grzegorczyk
text:
Currently sitting in the parking lot, waiting for a phone appointment with PA Tammie Smith so I can refill important medication. Over an hour and a half ago during my check in, I was told there were 2 people ahead of me. 45 minutes past my appointment time, I’m told there is still 1 person ahead of me. My appointment time was at 1:40, and it is now past 3pm with still no phone call. These phone conferences have never taken more than 5-10 minutes.

I’ve  been coming here for two years, and it’s been absolutely god awful. Never have I been to a Clinic that is this consistency unprofessional, doesn’t pick up the phone half the time, and can easily have you waiting to be seen for up to 2hours, sometimes more. Always severely understaffed as well, which makes me feel bad for the few employees there that are actually kind and decent. If it were not for sliding scale, I would never come back. If you have insurance, avoid this place at all costs. Seriously.

Update: Finally had my phone conference and PA Tammie Smith was rude per usual! Shouldn’t expect anything more from a doctor with multiple 1 star reviews on webmd though, right?

name: cesar ibarra
text: We love our pediatrician at Huntsville Family Health Center.  Dr. Xavier is very thorough and has gone the extra mile when caring for my child- time and time again.  I feel at ease putting the care of my child in Dr. Xavier's hands.  Dr. Xavier listens to me, addresses my concerns, and asks the right questions.  Overall, I'm very satisfied with him and will continue to see him for all of my pediatric needs.

resp.text: Hi Cesar, thank you for your review.  At Huntsville Family Health Center, we strive for excellence in caring for our patients.  We will relay the positive words you shared about Doctor Niraj Xavier with the team.  Thank you for continuing to make us your preferred choice!

name: Michelle Robison
text: Get to appt on time yet always have an hour or more wait before getting called to the back and then still sit in the room longer waiting for the Dr.

name: Chad Chaney
text: Very helpful everytime I go . My wifes diabetic meds costs almost $4000.00 everywhere and here it costs under 100.00

resp.text: Hello Mr. Chaney, thank you for your review about the helpfulness of our team at Huntsville Family Health Center.  We will certainly pass your comments along.

name: Tara Caputo
text: I love Dr. Kurecki and his office staff. He is easy to talk to and really listens! He has a lot of great advice, and I am not waiting 2 weeks to see him. He also has a very diverse background and a lot of medical knowledge. 10/10 recommend if you are looking for a family doc!

resp.text: Hi, Ms. Caputo. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. We'll be sure to pass your comments along to our Huntsville Family Health Center team.

name: Sharon Murph
text: The NP was unfriendly, rushing and didn’t listen to my complaints. I want Dr. Lisabeth Williams back!!!

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Murph. We are sorry to hear about this experience. Please consider calling us at (855) 724-7325 so that we can directly address this. Thank you.

name: Nina Thomas
text: Joel is awesome I wish the rest of the staff was like him. He assisted us in ten minutes we had the results we’ve been trying to receive for 21 days no one ever answered the phone so we had to drive to the health center

resp.text: Hi Nina.  Thank you for your feedback.  It will be shared with our leadership team.

name: Sadie Lynch
text: Always a warm welcome doctor Williams is the best

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us here at Huntsville Family Health Center.  We will pass your comments along to our team!

name: Jeanette Torres
text: The dr don’t know what they doing. They don’t really pay attention to what you want to say. The place is not sanitized right.im very unhappy with everything.

resp.text: Hi Jeanette Torres.   It is disappointing to learn that your experience was not positive, and we would like to get more details.  Please reach out to Jalin at 256-533-6311.  Thank you again for taking the time to reach out to us, and we hope to hear from you soon.

name: Kelley Cornelius
text: This office was absolutely laughable. The worst experience I have ever had at a physician's office.  They scheduled an MRI I arrive at the appointment to be sent away due to the fact that this office did not have the correct orders written.  Reschedule for the following week and again incorrect orders.  Mind you the place where I was having the MRI done also called multiple times and even physically went to this office to try to get things done.  Finally have the MRI done and they had the results the next day and two weeks later still no phone call about the results after I have called multiple times, left messages for a return phone call multiple times.  Then today I get someone FINALLY live on the phone and this person could not even pronounce the medical terminology, I ask to speak with someone else and she transfers me to an extension where the mailbox is full and I can't leave a message.  Soooo frustrated and changing to a new TRICARE provider.

resp.text: Hi Kelley, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention.  We are disappointed to hear of your negative experience with us.  Your review will be provided to our leadership team for addressing.  In the meantime, please call Jalin at 256-533-6311.  Thank you.

name: Madison Lowry
text: dr love does not listen and will talk over you. he is very rude and also likes to joke on you at your own expense. his nurses were phenomenal though and they’re the only reason HFHC isn’t getting 1 star.

resp.text: Hi Madison.  We are sorry to hear that you had a bad experience.  We will share your feedback with our leadership team.  In the meantime, please consider calling our Director of Operations, Joel Rojas at 256-533-6311 ext. 2234.

name: Sherry Black
text:
I am pretty sure it depends on who your doctor is, but... I never have to wait long when I go to my doctor! Rather I have an appointment or they are working me in, it is NEVER a long wait!
Dr Kurecki is my doctor & I think highly of him! I am very confident putting my health in his hands!

name: Matt Nieves
text: If it wasn't for how nice the doctor was w me I would've said 0 staff is very not proffesional and rude, the lady in the laboratory thinks she can treat everybody however she wants which not very proffesional I would not recommend this place

resp.text: Hello Matt.  Thank you for bringing this matter up to our attention.   Although you had a positive interaction with the doctor, we are disappointed to learn of your entire experience.  Please call our Director of Operations, Joel Rojas at 256-533-6311 ext. 2234 so that we can properly document your concern.  Thank you.

name: noella hall
text: My husband has been going to Dr Kurecki for some time now. He has always been at ease and all issues discussed, we absolutely love him.

name: Tea Raine
text: I went my first time and was happy to get help. Staff was nice and caring.

name: Cheria Moore
text: The staff on the first floor were amazing and very polite! On the second floor the nurse practitioner was rude, displayed unprofessional behavior and I will not be returning to this clinic!

name: Rebecca Louthan
text: The staff is very unprofessional and rude. I have never in my life been treated so poorly before.

name: Airi Ventura
text: My partner spent over $60 round trip to get help for his medical issues here, waited for over two hours, and then got told that there's nothing he could do about it. No referrals to any specialists, nothing. Don't go here unless you have no other choice.

name: Deanna Resler
text: Best I've had in a long time really cared and got me the right refferal needed for my gallbladder surgery I will defaintly be back for future sickness

name: Javon Green
text: Worst doctors office I've ever been to PLEASE DO DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME I had a appointment at 1pm waited two hrs! Still didn't see the doctor if I could give it a negative star I would

name: Alexis Olson
text:
Waited over 2 hours. I've never seen the Dr. It's always his nurse. Tried to call his answering service to cancel my appointment and the lady said she didn't even have my Dr's name in her computer.
Trust me when I say go somewhere else.

name: Latasha Rodgers
text: Got to the front door yeah

name: Irene Andrews
text: This place has gave me my life back. No more Hot flashes my libido was gone, but not anymore. Highly recommend this place. Dr. Markham is awesome.

resp.text: Irene, we are so happy that we were able to give you your life back!

name: Sharon H
text: Customer Service is premier.  This treatment saved my life- literally.  I was suffering from weight gain, depression, brain fog and all but dead libido.  Bio-identical hormones gave me back my old self.  I feel 30 inside and have stamina and energy to spare.  Dr. Markham is compassionate, funny, and attentive.  Don't go through menopause, come here to rediscover yourself before menopause took over.

name: Camilla Fitzgerald
text: Feeling like myself again thanks to the hormone replacement therapy I have been receiving at Restorative Health of Huntsville.  No more crazy or depression mode, no more night sweats, no more hot flashes.  Now if they can only make me like I did before menopause.  Oh wait, they can! I am going to try the Vampire Face lift next!!

name: GiGi
text:
Decided to look into this, they recommended prepayment for the year bc it would be cheaper (didn't except insurance).
Anesthesiologist inserted the 1st pellet time release dose, couldn't sit for 2wks. Next treatment was actually done by a gynecologist, no problem sitting after this one. Hate to say I noticed no change in how I felt. Called to schedule next treatment & they've closed this clinic on Memorial Pkwy in Huntsville. They will be moving this clinic into the same gynecologist's office that gave me my 2nd treatment, but they will be taking insurance only filing & that my contract was no longer valid. Money lost, very dissatisfied, disappointed, & angry. Evidently a new way to take your hard earned money.

name: Jennifer Mathis
text: The staff are friendly and helpful. Dr Markham is also a great doctor.

name: Irene Andrews
text: This place has gave me my life back. No more Hot flashes my libido was gone, but not anymore. Highly recommend this place. Dr. Markham is awesome.

Update: Finally had my phone conference and PA Tammie Smith was rude per usual! Shouldn’t expect anything more from a doctor with multiple 1 star reviews on webmd though, right?

name: cesar ibarra
text: We love our pediatrician at Huntsville Family Health Center.  Dr. Xavier is very thorough and has gone the extra mile when caring for my child- time and time again.  I feel at ease putting the care of my child in Dr. Xavier's hands.  Dr. Xavier listens to me, addresses my concerns, and asks the right questions.  Overall, I'm very satisfied with him and will continue to see him for all of my pediatric needs.

resp.text: Hi Cesar, thank you for your review.  At Huntsville Family Health Center, we strive for excellence in caring for our patients.  We will relay the positive words you shared about Doctor Niraj Xavier with the team.  Thank you for continuing to make us your preferred choice!

name: Michelle Robison
text: Get to appt on time yet always have an hour or more wait before getting called to the back and then still sit in the room longer waiting for the Dr.

name: Chad Chaney
text: Very helpful everytime I go . My wifes diabetic meds costs almost $4000.00 everywhere and here it costs under 100.00

resp.text: Hello Mr. Chaney, thank you for your review about the helpfulness of our team at Huntsville Family Health Center.  We will certainly pass your comments along.

name: Tara Caputo
text: I love Dr. Kurecki and his office staff. He is easy to talk to and really listens! He has a lot of great advice, and I am not waiting 2 weeks to see him. He also has a very diverse background and a lot of medical knowledge. 10/10 recommend if you are looking for a family doc!

resp.text: Hi, Ms. Caputo. Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with us. We'll be sure to pass your comments along to our Huntsville Family Health Center team.

name: Sharon Murph
text: The NP was unfriendly, rushing and didn’t listen to my complaints. I want Dr. Lisabeth Williams back!!!

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Murph. We are sorry to hear about this experience. Please consider calling us at (855) 724-7325 so that we can directly address this. Thank you.

name: Nina Thomas
text: Joel is awesome I wish the rest of the staff was like him. He assisted us in ten minutes we had the results we’ve been trying to receive for 21 days no one ever answered the phone so we had to drive to the health center

resp.text: Hi Nina.  Thank you for your feedback.  It will be shared with our leadership team.

name: Sadie Lynch
text: Always a warm welcome doctor Williams is the best

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us here at Huntsville Family Health Center.  We will pass your comments along to our team!

name: Jeanette Torres
text: The dr don’t know what they doing. They don’t really pay attention to what you want to say. The place is not sanitized right.im very unhappy with everything.

resp.text: Hi Jeanette Torres.   It is disappointing to learn that your experience was not positive, and we would like to get more details.  Please reach out to Jalin at 256-533-6311.  Thank you again for taking the time to reach out to us, and we hope to hear from you soon.

name: Kelley Cornelius
text: This office was absolutely laughable. The worst experience I have ever had at a physician's office.  They scheduled an MRI I arrive at the appointment to be sent away due to the fact that this office did not have the correct orders written.  Reschedule for the following week and again incorrect orders.  Mind you the place where I was having the MRI done also called multiple times and even physically went to this office to try to get things done.  Finally have the MRI done and they had the results the next day and two weeks later still no phone call about the results after I have called multiple times, left messages for a return phone call multiple times.  Then today I get someone FINALLY live on the phone and this person could not even pronounce the medical terminology, I ask to speak with someone else and she transfers me to an extension where the mailbox is full and I can't leave a message.  Soooo frustrated and changing to a new TRICARE provider.

resp.text: Hi Kelley, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention.  We are disappointed to hear of your negative experience with us.  Your review will be provided to our leadership team for addressing.  In the meantime, please call Jalin at 256-533-6311.  Thank you.

name: Madison Lowry
text: dr love does not listen and will talk over you. he is very rude and also likes to joke on you at your own expense. his nurses were phenomenal though and they’re the only reason HFHC isn’t getting 1 star.

resp.text: Hi Madison.  We are sorry to hear that you had a bad experience.  We will share your feedback with our leadership team.  In the meantime, please consider calling our Director of Operations, Joel Rojas at 256-533-6311 ext. 2234.

name: Sherry Black
text:
I am pretty sure it depends on who your doctor is, but... I never have to wait long when I go to my doctor! Rather I have an appointment or they are working me in, it is NEVER a long wait!
Dr Kurecki is my doctor & I think highly of him! I am very confident putting my health in his hands!

name: Matt Nieves
text: If it wasn't for how nice the doctor was w me I would've said 0 staff is very not proffesional and rude, the lady in the laboratory thinks she can treat everybody however she wants which not very proffesional I would not recommend this place

resp.text: Hello Matt.  Thank you for bringing this matter up to our attention.   Although you had a positive interaction with the doctor, we are disappointed to learn of your entire experience.  Please call our Director of Operations, Joel Rojas at 256-533-6311 ext. 2234 so that we can properly document your concern.  Thank you.

name: noella hall
text: My husband has been going to Dr Kurecki for some time now. He has always been at ease and all issues discussed, we absolutely love him.

name: Tea Raine
text: I went my first time and was happy to get help. Staff was nice and caring.

name: Cheria Moore
text: The staff on the first floor were amazing and very polite! On the second floor the nurse practitioner was rude, displayed unprofessional behavior and I will not be returning to this clinic!

name: Rebecca Louthan
text: The staff is very unprofessional and rude. I have never in my life been treated so poorly before.

name: Airi Ventura
text: My partner spent over $60 round trip to get help for his medical issues here, waited for over two hours, and then got told that there's nothing he could do about it. No referrals to any specialists, nothing. Don't go here unless you have no other choice.

name: Deanna Resler
text: Best I've had in a long time really cared and got me the right refferal needed for my gallbladder surgery I will defaintly be back for future sickness

name: Javon Green
text: Worst doctors office I've ever been to PLEASE DO DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME I had a appointment at 1pm waited two hrs! Still didn't see the doctor if I could give it a negative star I would

name: Alexis Olson
text:
Waited over 2 hours. I've never seen the Dr. It's always his nurse. Tried to call his answering service to cancel my appointment and the lady said she didn't even have my Dr's name in her computer.
Trust me when I say go somewhere else.

name: Latasha Rodgers
text: Got to the front door yeah

name: Irene Andrews
text: This place has gave me my life back. No more Hot flashes my libido was gone, but not anymore. Highly recommend this place. Dr. Markham is awesome.

resp.text: Irene, we are so happy that we were able to give you your life back!

name: Sharon H
text: Customer Service is premier.  This treatment saved my life- literally.  I was suffering from weight gain, depression, brain fog and all but dead libido.  Bio-identical hormones gave me back my old self.  I feel 30 inside and have stamina and energy to spare.  Dr. Markham is compassionate, funny, and attentive.  Don't go through menopause, come here to rediscover yourself before menopause took over.

name: Camilla Fitzgerald
text: Feeling like myself again thanks to the hormone replacement therapy I have been receiving at Restorative Health of Huntsville.  No more crazy or depression mode, no more night sweats, no more hot flashes.  Now if they can only make me like I did before menopause.  Oh wait, they can! I am going to try the Vampire Face lift next!!

name: GiGi
text:
Decided to look into this, they recommended prepayment for the year bc it would be cheaper (didn't except insurance).
Anesthesiologist inserted the 1st pellet time release dose, couldn't sit for 2wks. Next treatment was actually done by a gynecologist, no problem sitting after this one. Hate to say I noticed no change in how I felt. Called to schedule next treatment & they've closed this clinic on Memorial Pkwy in Huntsville. They will be moving this clinic into the same gynecologist's office that gave me my 2nd treatment, but they will be taking insurance only filing & that my contract was no longer valid. Money lost, very dissatisfied, disappointed, & angry. Evidently a new way to take your hard earned money.

name: Jennifer Mathis
text: The staff are friendly and helpful. Dr Markham is also a great doctor.

name: Irene Andrews
text: This place has gave me my life back. No more Hot flashes my libido was gone, but not anymore. Highly recommend this place. Dr. Markham is awesome.

text: The staff are friendly and helpful. Dr Markham is also a great doctor.

name: Toni Shamburger
text: I LOVE Them. Highly Recommend. Very Confidential. Love The “Color Code”

name: Abigail Jones
text: excellent experience. The employees, nurses, and doctors were very kind, helpful, and knowledgeable and did a very thorough job of helping me with what my options were and what I felt most comfortable with.

name: Kimberli Guerra-Portillo
text: People very nice always help me out with my BC stuff.

name: Sarah Rocha
text: Wonderful facility, reopened in February and everything looks great. Came to get a pill prescription, so glad I did and I’ll definitely return! Friendly front desk staff, NP who saw me was so personable and let me ask questions, from start to finish the visit was easy and everyone was so sweet. Upfront about costs as well!

name: Miyu X
text: Everyone here was very kind and very friendly, there were two sweet women standing outside to try and help be a buffer between me and the over zealous people shouting at me from the corner of the street about how they will "save my baby" (mind you I am not pregnant, and never have been, I am here for a yearly checkup and birth control) the girls buzzed me in and were friendly. The doctor on staff was very nice an knowledgeable. The nurses were friendly. This is a super good facility. All the 1 stars are just extremists who have probably never even been inside the building.

name: Tells The truth
text: There wait time is absolutely ridiculous!

name: Brittany Koogler
text: Thank you for everything you do!

name: Sarah Ferguson
text: Staff is always friendly and helpful. Never had to wait long to be seen.

name: lesley house
text: I had my first child through the Woman's Pavilion 8-1-21 Dr. Emig and staff are the best! I couldn't have asked for better everyone was so kind, genuine and treated me with the utmost care and concern. Dr. Emig is a fantastic doctor, Dr. Glass (as she did my C-section) as well as all the other physicians in the practice. Dr. Walker Pediatrician and all labor and delivery nurses I would recommend to anyone. Thank you!

name: Vanessa Munoz
text: I had my son here & I loved the staff. I recommend for any pregnant woman to come here.

name: Ayana Hendricks
text: I'm a FTM and my labor bar delivery was better than expected. My nurses were awesome during my entire stay. Dr. Glass is the best and I'm glad I chose her to care for me and my baby. I recommend all pregnant women to go to this location for labor and delivery.

name: Britney Johnson
text: literally hate this place. i’ve hated it for years but decided to give it another chance and FULLY regret it. they left a missed call NO voicemail, i call back, they “can’t find any notes on why they called” then i show up the NEXT DAY to my 8:30 appointment that i took off work for and tell me they moved my appointment to 11:45 then can’t tell me how long it’s going to even take. so if you’re a working mom like me then be careful.

name: Lindsay Bigham
text: Recently delivered my daughter here and the nursing staff was amazing. They were all so polite and even had a nurse in the room with me during labor. Loved this place!!!

name: Ranjit Gamara
text: Wonderful staff so polite and even had a nurse in the room with me during labor.we  Loved this place!

name: Clay Elliott
text: The care that my wife received during her pregnancy and while giving birth to our daughter was amazing! The nurses and doctors are top notch! IF we have another child we'll definitely be using them again!! The only gripe I have, as is with all hospitals, is the food wasn't that great and a little pricey. But on a good note, all food delivery services like Crimson2Go, Jimmy John's and Uber eats will all deliver to this location.

name: Leslie Alexander
text: My son had a day surgery hand surgery there. The staff was very nice and accommodating. They went out of their way to make us feel comfortable and meet our needs. My son was actually taken back early for surgery. During the surgery I got phone calls with updates in the room. One nurse offered me some snacks when he was taking a little while to wake up completely. The hospitality was second to none!

name: Kiara Lanier
text: if I can give them no stars I would I called up her to reschedule my appointment and lady hung up in my face.

name: Nanette Dunn
text: Every doctor in the women's Pavilion is great. Each one is caring, sweet, good bedside manners, informative, and will make sure that you leave your appointments feeling comfortable with no concerns.

name: Katie Hamilton
text: Dr Myers is the best. having my 4th child and couldn't have a better doctor looking out for my child heath or mine. I recommend her to all my friends and family.

name: Pamela Anthony
text:
We had a set scheduled induction date by Dr Meyers.  She said they wouldn’t cancel our appointment.

We were called late Thursday evening with a cancellation from the OB department bc they had NO rooms and they were full. To call the next day at 10am.  When we called They had 9 discharges set  for the day and we called 4 more times and those discharges Weren’t  even discharged by 3pm after we’ve called 4-5 times already rooms were still full.  Then at 4:15 Friday afternoon the hospital finally called us back  saying they had rooms but it was too late in the day to induce. We would have to reschedule for Sunday at 630am.
This is beyond ridiculous.   If we have another baby it’ll be somewhere else  bc they act like they don’t care and do not even want to do their jobs.  Smh.

name: Robyn Jordan
text: The labor and delivery staff was awesome!

name: Antoneisha Griffin
text: Extremely long wait times at this office !!! I always wait 2 or more hours.

name: Michael Amanda Whitis
text: I was skeptical at first because the initial conversation I had with the lady that answered the phone when I called . She wasn't very pleasant and seemed like I was bothering her but I am glad I didn't let her get me in a mood that would make me turn away from an eye appointment. The rest of my experience was awesome!!  The optical department was  so nice and sweet and very thorough with my eye exam. I have never gotten such an exam but I believe the doc did what is truly a actual eye exam unlike my past eye doctors. I got my prescription and was on my way without alot of waiting or hassle. Since I was passing through I went ahead and got checked for Covid. Once again the staff made the visit enjoyable other than probing my nose w a q-tip. The whole experience I had while I was there made me feel like I was truly hanging out with my own family, even including the impolite sister that I have to deal with on the phone some times

name: D TRON
text: Absolutely worthless. It's really sad that y'all would wait until there is a serious need for testing to start turning people away. ESPECIALLY after it was BROADCASTED on the news that y'all would be offering drive through testing. I am a previous patient and was told I'd receive a phone call from a nurse, that never came through. If you have the test, USE THEM

name: steve waller
text: The medical part of clinic is great,but the eye department is terrible, gave me wrong glasses prescription,after I had glasses made couldn't c thru them,they redid my prescription for free an admitted it was there mistake,but refused to pay the 210 to fix my glasses,so I paid for there mistake

name: Bigbearhug Widow
text: Kuddos to the after hours answering service. I can't say the same for Dr. Doyoun. When she finally called back she had an attitude and mentioned my call was not an emergency. As I'm trying to explain my concern she is loudly out talking me and breathing heavily while I'm explaining.  Very unprofessional.  I thanked her for her time and assured her I would go see a doctor that is concerned.

name: Brandy Pemberton
text: The pediatric department is awesome! The adult department is awful! And since COVID don’t show up with a cough or runny nose they will kick you out and embarrass you and won’t treat you for what you originally came in there to be seen about until you have a negative COVID result! Even though you don’t have COVID symptoms. I will never be back! And if you value your health you won’t go either.

name: aqua 12
text: The front staff of the adult healthcare center is rude and snobby!!!! Imm even met one nurse there she was an angel 👼 I forgot her name and my therapists are amazing too and they were okay to me in my pregnancy in 2019-2020  they didn’t seem so welcoming but it’s okay 👌

name: Carla Inzina
text: Very nice place to go staff is friendly and they get you in and out quickly very clean Facility AwesomeDoctors and nurses

name: Margaret Robinson
text: This clinic has really gone downhill under current management.  They make appointments for you and don’t notify you they made the appointment!  Then call you angry that you missed your time slot.  They also use advanced Practioners to save money so it’s impossible usually to see a MD.  And a lot of problems and rx’s require an MD.  They also push vaccines and if you refuse any they get very aggressive and make suggestions that you will die for not getting a Pneumonia vaccine for example.  I’m done with this clinic.

name: Margaret Robinson
text: This clinic has really gone downhill under current management.  They make appointments for you and don’t notify you they made the appointment! name: Adam Fitch
text: Got turned away after I brought my son for a checkup after a seizure because the nurse personnel thought on how my children should be raised and was talking out loud in the lobby about our situation

name: Cathy Smith
text: They force you to see a new doctor that you never agreed to see and refuse to change it.

name: Tabetha Sellers
text: My children have gone here since they were small. The doctors are very straight to the point. But they are doing their job. They did an amazing job years ago on diagnosing my daughters thyroid problem and acted quickly with all the right medicines. At times they are brutally honest. But I can appreciate that.

name: ivette gon
text: Dr. Broughton makes you wait for hours before he sees you for at least 5 minutes.  It's ridiculous that there are not many options to choose from and you're stuck with this kind of service and treatment.  The other employees are ok, but he needs to stop sitting in front of the computer and take care of his patients quickly and efficiently. Very dissapointed!

name: TAMMY McCLOSKEY
text: my mom was a patient there and  she has been  going there  for a while now and I called to talk to front desk and  then she transferred me to mrs still nurse which I spoke to a lady named Rhonda ,  She was very RUDE and I explained to her that was her job to be nice to these eldery people because thats what kind of job she has.... I WOULD NOT REFER ANYONE I KNOW TO THAT OFFICE , THEY ARE RUDE AND VERY UNPROFESSIONAL......

name: Michael Burrough
text: This is the most horrible medical offices that I have ever gone to. Everything about it is miserable. It's criminal that some people have no other choice but to go there. Incompetent and rude staff. These are not professionals. They are unqualified. I will NEVER go back again!

name: Donn J Kemmerer
text: Dr. Rodríguez is one of the best doctors I have ever visited .Now that I'm older I appreciate knowledge, communication , and actual honest care for the patient. AAA treatment.

name: Sheritha & Mathew Roehrig
text: I really don't understand how they are still open . I have been going to that doc. Office since I was young and it's still the same . Slow and rude like they don't want to be there. And let's not get on their phone etiquette's I would recommend a private doctor or the health department before coming back to this place.

name: richard kaska
text: My Dr is like an angel. Actually allows me to be active in my treatment options

name: Sandy Moody
text: dr.doctors are very firm and caring

name: Rachel Osterkamp
text: Love this place!!! Front desk, and all staff is just AMAZING!!! Low cost and very nice!

name: Todd Addison
text: Did not correct my issue and was very stubborn about listening to what I was saying about it.  After his first surgery I still had same pain in my left hand.  I explained that I felt it was Golf related. I felt I had a broken hamate bone.. he was adamant about blowing me off.  After being released from him, I went to Andrew’s Orthopedic and they confirmed exactly what I thought.  My “Hook of the Hamate” was fractured. Now I’m having surgery to fix what was my issue. What a complete waste of my time he was!

name: Aaron Southern
text: I was referred to Dr. Bonatz for carpal tunnel syndrome. His staff was fantastic. They were able to get me an appointment right away. Dr. Bonatz took his time to make sure every question I had was answered. Their surgery coordinator was able to work me into their surgery schedule within the following week. After the surgery, I was back to work within 3 days, typing on a keyboard all day. If I could give more than 5 stars, I would. I am currently scheduling my surgery with my other hand. Definitely check them out!

resp.text: Wow, we appreciate the high praise, Aaron! We're thankful you chose us to be a part of your recovery journey, and we'll be sure to pass along your kind words to everyone involved.

name: Jason Hall
text: I was referred to Dr. Bonatz by my orthopedic surgeon. She had told me that he was one of the best hand surgeons around. I will say that received great care and the surgery went well. Very pleased with the overall experience. He is the best.

resp.text: Thank you for the review, Mr. Hall! We're thrilled that you had a great experience with our clinic.

name: Jared Dailey
text: Dr. Bonantz is rude, does not listen, and does not deal with the correct problems.  I went to him with a hand problem and he informed me I am an overweight diabetic,  which I already knew.  He sent his nurse in with papers for bariatric surgery across the hall.  I have a cyst in my hand I need removed.   I'm well aware of my weight problems.   I have to buy my clothes.  No thank you, you rude, self righteous know it all.  He also told me I would die without the covid vaccine,  and he's told multiple other people this.  I would not recommend this "doctor" to anyone. for anytbing

resp.text: Thank you for bringing this issue to our attention, Jared. We at Southlake Orthopaedics hold ourselves to the highest possible standards of patient care, so we are terribly sorry to hear about this experience. Please reach out to me at (205) 985-4111 or email me at mjones@slortho.com so we can better understand the problem and better serve our patients in the future.

name: Kimberli Calma
text: Dr. Bonatz and his staff are amazing! He is brilliant and he has surrounded himself with an amazing knowledgeable and caring team.  Their attentiveness and follow up is amazing and this comes from a patient with an emergency on a Friday that continued over the weekend into the following week.  They did not miss a beat ensuring I have a healthy full functioning hand.  Thank you Thank you!

name: candy j
text: Dr. Bonatz has to be one of the worst doctors I’ve ever seen. My first visit with him was Nov 6 fracture ring finger sprained middle finger. He had me to start Occupational Therapy immediately. My return visit with Dec 8. My range of motion had improved however the strengthening had not even begun. All of my OT were saying the same thing my hand needed further OT because of my job. On Dec 8 2020 Dr. Bonazt entered the room and began talking with the door of the room wide open. I asked if he could close the door while we discussed my injury. His response no because of COVID-19 a violation of my patients rights mind you Dr. Bonazt was not wearing a mask nor gloves so much for concerns. Also, while waiting on him the door was closed the entire time and anyone else that entered closed the door behind them. He ask me what my job title was twice which I’m sure was on my report. He indicated that the fracture was healing pretty good I didn’t need surgery and therefore there was nothing else he could do. I question him because I must be 100% my strength in my hand indicated that I could hold up to13lbs briefly. I asked him for copies of the report he denied me of that also, stating that workman’s comp would have to request it. Forgetting when I visit him the first time he did.  His sarcastic remarks and tone was very belittling. To add insult to injury as he was walking out he says if you break anything else come see me. Unbelievable and Rude he obviously doesn’t care because there’s no repercussions behind his actions.

name: Kaye Byrd
text: Dr. Bonanza and assistants were pleasant, explained procedures, and answered my questions fully.

name: Jane Carson
text: Office staff was very friendly and helpful . Dr Bonatz was on spot and Office was quick to setup the additional testing to verify my issues so that Dr Bonatz could resolve them. I learned about him from a friend w similar probs and she had excellent results. From everything so far,  I’m sure I will have the same excellent results.

name: Marilyn Seier
text: Excellent surgeon and has operated on both wrists and more recently my right hand. He thoroughly explains the diagnosis and the course of action to repair the problem. In case of an emergency like with my hand he saw me right away and planned surgery two days later. My Southlake physical therapist, Cathy, helped me rehab after all 3 surgeries and she is fantastic

name: Bobby Smith
text: Friendly, helpful,great staff, treat you like family.

name: Crystal Watford
text: Dr. Bonatz is professional, personable, and also quick, which I appreciate. He makes sure I understand what he has explained before leaving the room. He's done one surgery on my hand and is about to do another. I have no hesitations.

name: Ruth Black
text: He’s a sadistic man. Don’t go to him!  He hurts you & he allows you to be in excruciating pain after surgery. There are GREAT hand surgeons in Birmingham who have MANNERS and do not enjoy seeing their patients in pain.  One is Dr. Smith. He’s in the same office.

name: Beverly Kirkpatrick
text: Everyone was very friendly & professional. Dr. Bonatz was very thorough & explained everything concerning treatment for my problem. I would definitely recommend to others.

name: Candis Threatt
text: Dr. Bonatz is so straightforward but also very thorough. My son had a broken thumb that most times would require surgery, Dr. Bonatz simply had my son put in a cast and said, "Three weeks!" In exactly three weeks his thumb healed properly and he's back doing what he loves... Playing BASKETBALL! The supporting staff(front desk, nurses, pct, etc) were phenomenal!

name: Staci Rowell
text: Dr Bonatz is brilliant!  He is precise, professional and courteous. Would definitely recommend him to anyone needing hand/wrist treatment.

name: Madelyn Bauman
text: Very pleased with my association with this clinic and Dr. Bonatz. Every staff member I encountered was friendly and helpful, especially the front desk. Dr. Bonatz is warm, kind and careful, double checking the info received from xrays, etc. Should you be in need of this type medical assistance, I highly recommend this clinic.

name: Efagan53
text: In and out quick, all questions answered in a professional manner

name: William Green
text: The doctor has a sense of humor and a strong personality. He has a plethora of knowledge. I like that. I’d trust him with my children any time!

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback.  Our goal at Southlake Orthopaedics is to provide excellent patient care.

name: Jim Cook
text: I don't have the knowledge to evaluate my visit based on the medical expertise of the people I saw, but I can talk about the efficiency of the office personnel, the personal respect from everyone I saw (both for patients and for each other), and the overall positive atmosphere there. Top notch. Dr. Bonatz took a lot of time to examine my inury, and he followed up by taking me out of the examination room to show me details of my x-rays and diagrams of the injury. That was something I liked very much.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback.  Our goal is to provide excellent service to all our patients.

name: Laine Poole
text: Absolutely the best possible care for any medical problems related to the hand and wrist.

resp.text: Thank you for the the review.

name: m mills
text:
First I can not say enough good things about the staff, they were extremely nice and compassionate. But Dr Ekkhard Bonatz is not, he has zero ethics. He told me he would preform surgery on my broken wrist but and I quote "it would not work anyway", DO NOT LET THIS MAN TREAT YOU!
I ask if I could see my break on an x-ray and he brought in a plastic arm, he patted my arm and thanked me because he could pay off his daughters college tuition with my injury. He acted like a pediatrician talking to a child. He refused pain treatment and said he would drink if it were him, again DO NOT LET THIS MAN TREAT YOU!

name: Dale Dixon
text: I was very nervous at first, in past others gave me no hope. Dr.Bonatz gave me the hope I have been looking for. Very kind and attentive. I feel 100% positive now. All staff made it a pleasurable visit. Thank you Dr.Bonatz

name: Catherine “Best Friend” Marie
text: I would not send my worst enemy to this man. He lied about the procedure,  he lied about the treatment and was upset and told us that if we were to seek a second opinion he would no longer treat. He gave wrong meds when he had pathology report right in front of him . Not a compassionate person and neither is his assistant. Would NOT recommend.

name: Bo Canning
text:
Dr. Bonatz and staff are the most knowledgeable, caring team in Alabama. Dr. Bonatz took the time to answer all my questions during the process of rebuilding my hand. I never felt rushed by him.
His staff were the same way, taking time to discuss the questions you forgot to ask Dr. Bonatz. They are very knowledgeable and very caring.
His P.T. staff are the  and same way, they know their stuff, and are always encouraging you to do your exercises at home.  If you do what they say, you will improve your hand. (They are the best)
Lastly, the front desk and waiting room, in a word, excellent.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback.  Our goal is to provide excellent patient care!

name: Chris Davis
text: Hands down one of the best doctors visits ever! Dr. Bonatz put me at ease with his knowledge, straight forward approached with a great dose of humor. His staff was friendly, quick and efficient and I feel like I received the best healthcare. I highly recommend Dr. Bonatz at Southlake Orthopedics

name: Kimberly Snelling
text: Dr Bonatz is least compassionate Dr I have ever had the misfortune to meet! He has no ethics whatsoever. He told my husband he would do surgery on his hand but it probably wouldn't work. He mentioned he needed the money for his daughter s college. He also said he would do the second surgery, he mentioned he wanted to go Spain. He also thanked my husband for fracturing his wrist. If you have hurt yourself and need treatment I wouldn't not recommend Dr. Bonatz. I would not take my dog to him. The staff however were very helpful and compassionate.

resp.text: At Southlake Orthopaedics we certainly sympathize with our patients and the pain they have due to injuries or other conditions.  Very sorry you found your recent visit to be unsatisfactory to the standard you expected.  We are happy to coordinate a second opinion with one of our other Board Certified physicians if you so choose.  Our goal is to improve any conditions we can.

name: DEBRA SMITH
text: Dr. Bonatz and staff gave me excellent care before and after surgery. I couldn't have ask for better treatment.

resp.text: Thank you for the feedback!

name: Juandelisha Perry
text: I am so greatful to have met Dr. Bonatz and the staff of Southland  orthopedic. For over 10+ years of  chronic pain I spent years searching for help and  consulting with my primay physican, rheumatologist,  neurologist, osteoarthritis, pain management, and any other specialist.   Unfortunately, they all gave up on me and past me on to the next specialist. Finally, I was referred to, I was Dr. Bonatz.  The frist cosultation, he knew what was wrong, schedule some tests and did not give up on me until he solved the problem.  For the first time in years, I can sleep at night with out pain, go outside during the winter with out pain. Thank you so much!!!

name: C Miller
text: I am due to have surgery with Dr. Bonatz  in the next couple of weeks. So I cannot speak of that experience yet. I can however speak of his Staff which has been wonderful, and informative, as has Dr. Bonatz. I would have given 5 stars except for the fact both times I have been to see him, once at Grandview, the other at the Southlake office, both times I had to wait 20 to 30 minutes past my appointment time. I realize they get busy, however  my time is important as well   My suggestion would be to find a way to improve upon that.  It’s a shame to have an appointment time of 1:15pm and not leave until 3:00.

name: Kassie Luster
text: We had a really good experience with Dr Bonatz. We were very pleased with the care we recieved. My 10 yr old broke her pinky finger and it went into her growth plate. He was very good with her and making the right decision for her care. She was in a custom splint made for just her size for 3 weeks. We went back and he was so nice. Said she was healing nicely. She really liked him alot and would recommend anyone else with smaller children to see him. Staff was really awesome as well. We had not longer than a five min wait time each time we went.

name: Ronald Barksdale
text: Awesome

resp.text: Thanks for the review.

name: Mark Elders
text: Hi! We got great service at the Publix Edgemont Town Center this past Tuesday, June 8th, 2021. Lara P. is always so nice at the checkout and I also went through Kara J's line and she is very nice too. Thanks so much and God bless. Mark and Tim Elders

name: Darlene Batchelor
text: Excellent service, courteous, and go that extra step to help you. Also work well with Physician’s office for prior authorization on prescriptions. Just an awesome group!!

name: Mary Claire
text: I have been getting prescriptions filled at this pharmacy for years and they are so great. They are the reason I have stayed with Publix Pharmacy for this long.

name: W
text:
My experience today was a great experience .
I received the Covid -19 vaccine Johnson & Johnson. This morning through Publix pharmacy. My arm is not sore and I'm feeling perfectly normal.
Thank You Publix Pharmacy..

name: Buonasera Ferah

text: I really love Publix's their customer service skills are epic, every time I go it's always a joyful experience thank you Publix

text: The pharmacies in Vestavia Hills and Homewood, Al. is terrible. I was all but accused of stealing a prescription I prepaid for using their app because the pharmacist was unaware of what bin my prescription came from.

name: Jordan Gibbs
text: Don’t expect your meds to be ready on time. There’s a pharmacist there that LOVES HER CELLPHONE & can’t be bothered with things like her job. Instead of customer service, they like to argue & blame the customer. Unfortunately, they really, REALLY don’t care.

name: Benjamin Fletcher
text: Very nice experience very clean nice people

name: Carleen Evans
text: Love this Shopping Center

name: Yvonne Self
text:
I went there to get my third vial of insulin after Publix told CVS they only had two. CVS wouldn't sell me my usual three saying "the system had kicked me out." I believe that was the phrase the clerk used. The reason given was that it was too expensive! My copay was only $70--much less than I have paid when in the GAP. I was totally out of insulin.

CVS called Publix and was told they only had two vials. My daughter drove me there and I paid $70 with my debit card. I was told to come back for the third. I went there Friday, the 14th of June and was told they had no knowledge that I only received two vials. Then they refilled my prescription for three vials without my request. I wish now that I had refused and walked away. I am now using a privately-owned pharmacy. I am beginning to get used to being taken advantage of being old, but I do not appreciate it. The young men were laughing. Cute.

Yvonne Self

name: Kristina McMahan
text: I was put on hold for over 15 minutes, and then once I got to speak to the pharmacist like I requested, she was so very rude!!! Publix prides themselves on having "premium" service, and this just experience was far below that quota.

name: April Crump
text: Pharmacy tech was super nice and helpful.

name: Michal Shar
text: Just transferred all my scripts away from here after extremely inefficient and RUDE treatment

name: Gigi Talley
text: Publix is always a pleasure!!

name: sayte mccomb
text: Personnel is FANTASTIC!

name: Lois Carroll
text: It's clean and friendly

name: Stuart Roper
text: I take generic Mobic for my arthritis. Last month they were filled at Publix. For the entire month it was easy to tell it was not working. I went back to my normal pharmacy and instantly started feeling better. Turns out they use medication manufactured in the USA and Publix comes  from  a  overseas corporation  and is manufactured  elsewhere  as well. Upon researching  this some. They have a history of exactly  my issue with various drugs. And apparently  with cleanliness  as well. My family deserves better and Publix  pharmacy  is not it. Very dissatisfied  especially  after a month in pain due to substandard  pharmaceuticals. Wonder what The billboard guy is up too?

name: Marc Patterson
text: Very professional, clearly dedicated to the customer's best service.

name: Deana Elkins
text: The pharmacy has wonderful techs willing to go above and beyond for each customer. I've now transferred all scripts to the Muscle Shoals Publix Pharmacy and my family is starting to transfer to them also.

name: Even Steven
text: Terrible. Took my prescription and said come back in a couple hours. Then gave me the prescription back instead of my medication, saying "we didn't have any"

name: Paula Farley
text: Have been here 45 mins and still waiting.

text: Super slow so if ur in a rush dont use them !!!!!!

name: LeShawn Watson
text: My kids have been coming to this clinic for the last 5yrs and the last 2x I have been there has been a issue the first issue was they forgot us and missed plAced her paperwork. And this time we were scheduled to come in but the weather was bad so they had to reschedule  us she scheduled us for 12:00 we get there I'm told they do not see pt until 12:45 I informed her that's not what I was told I took my lunch to bring her in had I knew that she was a work in I would have came at 4 when I got off it is truly sad how this office has went down the only area that I can say good service would be the receptionist and the nursing assistant. The rest of the office is slow they procrastinate doing everything from taking blood until the doctor come in just sad!!!!!!!!!

text: I switched to SWC and Dr Cooper after I had a traumatic birth experience at another BHM hospital. Dr Cooper and her staff are lovely and kind. They truly care for their patients and listen.  The midwives are fantastic and when I went through my second pregnancy I felt that I could trust them with my care. I recommend this place to every women who desires to be treated with respect and who wants her voice to be heard. They are very friendly towards natural birthing, breastfeeding and low intervention.

text: ENT office was nice and clean. Very fast and timely service. Dr. Clark was awesome. He was very thorough.

You have to pay copay, pay for medicine and pay to park. There should be free parking for doctors visits or a discount.

resp.text: We're so glad you had a good experience with us! Thanks for your review, JoAnn.

text: My mother’s physician is Dr. William Kirby. He and the nurse staff are absolutely excellent. Always caring. Always flexible and patient. They are about patient care. I would highly recommend this clinic.

name: Bellalinn
text: Dr. Ballio is a very nice and professional doctor. Staff is always kind and smiling. Just saw a new GYN doctor Ballio sent me to. Her name is Dr. Collins and I found her to be very nice. She addressed everything I spoke of and treated me with dignity. This is so important.

resp.text:
We're glad you had a nice visit with us, Bella!

Thanks for your review too!

name: Brooke Quintero
text: Dr. Cooper is absolutely amazing. She made my second Birth and PP experience The best I could ask for and more. The Nurses are so kind and genuinely love their job and serving you. resp.text: Brooke, thank you so much for the positive review.  We wish you and your family the best!

name: Tammy Price
text: Easy in and out .Friendly staff.

name: Aminah Shah
text:
I’ve had great experiences with the doctors from Simon-Williamson clinic that I’ve used: Dr. Tibbetts (pediatrics), Dr. LeCroy (ophthalmology), and Dr. Wood (internal medicine). There were a couple of doctors that have left the clinic but who were also wonderful. I’ve found the staff to be generally very nice and helpful. Parking is a little pricey, but that’s just part of it. It’s not the clinic’s fault.

I’ve signed up for the health records app, and most of my doctors have been very timely in recording results.

Overall, I am a happy client of SWC.

name: ArianaSaré P.
text: This place charged me for someone else's bill; it's been 3 weeks and they still have not refunded the money they owe my husband and I. They are so unprofessional, I do not recommend.

name: Alexcia
text: Worst hospital ever!!!! Dr. William Kirby and his NP Samantha Williams are the most incompetent people in the medical field. They refuse to run necessary test to rule out various health conditions and then when you fight for medical care they dismiss you as a patient. If you want to die this is the place to go. If otherwise go to UAB.

name: Sharrah Gibson
text: I'm originally from Birmingham and I just recently moved back to Birmingham, so I called the Simon-Williamson clinic today to establish care w/ a primary physician.  I think the person I talked to over the phone name was Donna. And one of the 1st things she said to me was "none of our doctors prescribe long term pain medications".  Then she asked me what current medications was I on? Before even really trying to figure out my need I fell like she automatically assumed with her questions and her tone that I was a drug seeking patient with numerous heath concerns.  Even when I told her I'm just new in town, and just wanted to establish care w/ a physician, she still did not listen to me.  She proceeded to tell me that most of the doctors that are accepting new patients will have to receive my medical records and review them 1st before taking me on as a patient.  She told me to go to the website, look at the doctors then call her back.  I've never had this type of customer service before in my life!! 😩😡 I felt like she made so many assumptions w/o discovering my real need.  I'm a healthy 32 year old that just wants to be proactive w/ my health.  You do not only have to go to the doctor when you are sick!!

name: Hannah Miller
text: I made an appointment 2 weeks prior to today and confirmed it with a receptionist over the phone who was not very personable to begin with. I was told how to get here, what floor, what time and even to arrive early. I arrive and the receptionist tells me that she doesn’t even have me scheduled for an appointment yet she took my personal information over the phone! This is ridiculous. She then proceeded to ask if I’d like to schedule an appointment. I did not drive all the way up here to schedule an appointment! I will be finding a new primary care physician. My time, energy, & pto has been wasted today.

name: Josh B
text:
Had a child at Princeton, Dr. E. was assigned to us as a pediatrician while in postpartum.  Dr. E. seemed knowledgeable and friendly in the two times he visited us after the birth. The first time he gave our baby an exam and "tested" his reflexes.  The second time he came by was similar to the first. Together both visits cost $240 and were less than 30min each. In addition to Dr. E's visit we were discharged by Dr. T.  Dr. T. did less than Dr. E. though the visit was similar to the other two.  $100 for less than 30min as per statement.

As a cash paying patient, I would have liked to have been notified of the additional charges ahead of time. In addition, I would have expected a higher quality of care for what i was charged. Overall, one star per Dr and minus three for the unnecessarily expensive and deceptive billing practices.

name: Megan Rowe
text: If 0 Stars was an option I would leave it for the primary care physician staff at this clinic. Appointment times are changed without notification and there is NO patient consideration when it comes to time. The staff is very unhelpful and was refused to be transferred to the patient care representatives by the operator. If you have the ability to use a different clinic I highly recommend it. Birmingham is full of wonderful internal medicine physicians but the staff at this clinic makes the experience negative.

name: Terri Ward
text: I worked there and it was awful. I've never worked with doctor's who didn't care about people, like those there. I worked with Dr. Cotton and she would get mad at me for helping our elderly patients fill out their paperwork.  She would say " if they needed help, they should've brought their family with them". That is just the tip of the iceberg. Most employee's were nice, but I would never want a doctor from there.

name: Google User
text: I love the doctors. They were so good to me during my pregnacy and was willing to answer any questions I had as a new mom. My son sees the peditricion there. The only thing that makes me not wanna go to our appointments is having to pay for the parking. I moved here from another state and I've never had to pay to get out of the parking lot.

name: Debra Parker
text: It was very busy...

name: Albert McWilliams Sr
text: I do not recommend this facility. I don't believe their primary concern is quality healthcare. Many of the staff members are very adversarial, and cavalier in their interactions with patients.

name: Marilyn Evans
text: Leia the operator is at SWC gives very good customer service. I was not having a good day. She made me feel better by being very courteous to me. Thanks Leia.

name: hugh darty
text: Get ready to sit in the waiting room for hours. Came over to pick up a pair of replacement hearing aids and now am 1.5 hours past pickup time and no end in sight. Been trying to get these picked up for two weeks as they have been here that long according to their representatives. Very unorganized. Had a brother in law sit here all day once as they lost his appointment in the system.

name: Charles Pace
text:
Do NOT see Dr James Lindsey. He has been my doctor for 30 years. Liked him better when he had his other nurse, not WENDY... She has screwed up my meds more times than I can count. When my mom was sick with cancer, he told us (the family) that we should leave the hospital room and pull the plug .She lived 4 more months WITHOUT PAIN, thanks to another doctor.   Wendy left me a message, that I still have, telling me that Ambien 10 is going To be discontinued, I contacted the manufacturer. They said they weren't doing any discontinuing.  I called to see about signing a release for my medical records to be sent to another doctor (because he would not fill my diuretic or Ambien) both I had been on for years with no side effects, Wendy called my pharmacist and deactivated all my meds .Thank God I got the refills before this happened. Anyway, tons more
Going to file with the Board, BBB ETC .

name: Mandy Jones
text: I had surgery here and I didn't receive but a low dose of pain meds while in tears begging to go home talking to my nurse singing my papers she was like wow no wonder your hurting so bad she did read my chart what if she had given me the wrong medication also I was paying what I could every month but they turned in over to a collection agency so now it goes on my credit the are just money hungry and dont care about you they also let homeless people and drugged up people set in the ER waiting room they beg for money and try to steal your stuff if you go here good luck.

name: daphne richardson
text: I recently visited Dr. Williams (OBGYN), she was very informative and attentive but her nurse was very rude.

text: They are pleasant, clean, helpful

name: Senator Bates
text: Try another hospital please!!!!!!!!

name: Barbara Sturdivant

name: Twink Holland
text: This office has been so helpful to my family and me.  The entire staff is pleasant and professional.  They know who I am when I call and take care of my questions in a timely manner.  Making an appointment is easy, too.  Jenny Lee Southwood CRNP is pleasant, caring and takes her time with me each time I see her. She is never in a rush and listens to all my concerns.   I highly recommend this office without hesitation!  Thanks Jenny Lee, for taking care of my health!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences, Twink! We're so glad that Jenny Lee and the rest of our team are meeting all of your health care needs with a personal touch. We'll make sure the entire staff sees your sweet comments.

text: Always a great experience. They are able to get me in quickly when I call. Front office staff is nice always. The office is always clean.  Nurse is wonderful and even recognizes my 7 year old son I bring with me and knows his interests. I see one of the nurse practitioners and I think she is one of the best. I have referred many people to her over the past few years. My entire family (husband, mother, grandmother, uncle, friends, etc) go here. I encourage anyone looking for a great family practice to consider them!

resp.text: Thank you for the amazing review, Mrs. Helton! It means so much that you trust our team to care for your entire family. We'll continue to do our best to provide you with great primary care and customer service.

name: thomas holland
text: I have been a patient with this group for over 5 years and am absolutely satisfied with their care. Being a healthcare professional, I understand what it takes to be a compassionate, caring person in that setting and Ms. Southwood, CRNP, does so effortlessly  with grace and kindness. She is knowledgeable and thorough in questioning me about my health concerns and during routine exams. The rest of the staff always greets me with a smile and my visits are always easy and I’m not kept waiting staring at the walls.

resp.text: Hello, Mr. Holland. Thank you for allowing us to serve you for the past 5 years. We hope you will be a part of our practice for many more. We'll let Nurse Practitioner Southwood know how impressed you are with her great care.

name: Abby Patterson
text: Dr. Jones is a fabulous doctor, very kind and caring. She diagnosed an issue that no other doctor has in the past ten years. Her MA, Ericka, was very helpful and made me feel comfortable at all times. I highly recommend!

name: Kendall Reasons
text: This was the first time I have sat down with a doctor and didn’t feel rushed. Dr. Caton took her time and made sure to explain everything to me and it didn’t seem like she was rushing me out the door. I highly recommend her! She is highly knowledgeable and genuinely so sweet. Her and her staff are WONDERFUL!!

resp.text: Hello, Kendall. Thank you for taking the time to share your impressions of Dr. Caton and her staff. We're so glad you have found a physician you like and a medical home with our practice. We look forward to continuing to care for you.

name: amy m
text: I was looking for a new family doctor and found a great one here. I see Dr Jones and she’s awesome. I had no trouble getting an appointment, Dr Jones and her nurse were very thorough at my new patient visit, and she answered all questions/concerns I had. I have a six month follow up and that appointment is already scheduled and my orders for any labs I’ll need prior to the appointment are already in the computer system so all I have to do is go get them drawn and I’m ready for my appointment. I would recommend Dr. Jones to any of my friends and family.

resp.text: We appreciate the kind words and the great review, Amy! We''re thrilled that you chose us for your health care needs.

text: I went to the Gurley clinic before it shut down and seen Gail Prentice CRNP for years. I was so sad when she transfered,and than the clinic closed so I moved to the Madison Clinic back to Gail Prentice, so happy to be back the office is nice and clean but best of all Im back seeing Gail Prentice shes the best. She listens to you and stays on top of your care, I have always received awesome service, and so Happy to be Back they are all so nice.

resp.text: Hello, Ms. Dixon. We're glad you have found a new primary care home with our practice. We certainly agree with your comments about CRNP Prentice and will let her know how satisfied you continue to be with her great care. Thank you for the wonderful review!

name: LIZ
text: Great doctor!  I am very impressed with Dr Rachel Jones.  Recommend her to anyone wanting a wonderful, caring and knowledgeable doctor.  She listens and takes time to thoroughly answer all questions.

She literally did nothing but ask random questions which really couldve been done over the phone. I also have to wait a month to get labs and another appt. Will  definitely not return.

resp.text: Hello. We are very sorry to hear about this and would like to talk with you personally about your concerns. Please call (256) 265-5970 at your earliest convenience and ask for the Practice Administrator.

name: Yushima C.
text: I met with Dr. Jones for the first time today. I felt heard. I felt hopeful. I feel empowered. I have been going here for a while, my other doctor has her strengths as well. I am literally excited for my next visit.

resp.text: This is wonderful to hear, Yushima! We'll make sure to pass along your compliments to Dr. Jones. Thank you for allowing us to care for you.

name: Thomas Stricklin
text: I rely on Ms. Southwood, CRNP, for all my primary care. She is a caring professional who is knowledgeable, courteous, and VERY thorough. She patiently answers all my questions, addresses any concerns, and is careful to ensure that I understand everything discussed. She closely coordinates my care with various specialists and my complex pharmacy requirements (diabetes and cancer). I trust her completely with my care. I also wish to acknowledge the nurse that assists her, Ms. Monterusso. She is also a caring professional who always puts the patient's welfare and comfort first. The other support staff at the facility are also great. I don't really know how it could be any better.

resp.text: Hello, Mr. Stricklin. Wow, what an amazing account of your experience with CRNP Southwood! Our goal is for every patient at Huntsville Hospital Physician Care-Madison to be as satisfied with their care as you are. We'll make sure that she and Nurse Monterusso see your kind comments. Thank you so much for sharing!

name: Yushima Cherry Burks Author, Therapist, CEO (YearofYushima)
text: A lot of things change from the first visit to my last. A lack of communication from Dr. Jones could have caused significant injury to me.

resp.text: Hello. We would like to speak with you personally so we can better understand your concerns. Please call (256) 265-5970 and ask for the Practice Administrator. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Tekoa Shager
text: Jenny Lee Southwood and the entire staff are polite and professional. I would recommend them to my friends and family.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the kind words and the great review! We appreciate your support.

name: Tim McCarley
text: Jenny Southwood and Ashley are both outstanding.  Very Professional and genuine!!!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words and the 5-star review, Mr. McCarley. We're glad to have you as part of our growing practice.

name: Ryan Henson
text: Worst experience ever! I made a appointment over a month ago for today 2-7. I get to my appointment 45 min early to fill out new patient paperwork and was informed that I was not on the schedule. Instead of them fitting me in because they made a mistake they tried to give me a new appointment in another two weeks. I waited a month for this appointment what the heck. I take thyroid medicine I am almost out of.  I would have gave less stars if I could have, this was absolutely the worst doctor office experience I have ever had!

name: Heidi Fowler
text: Great staff!  Always helpful and kind.

resp.text: Thank you for saying that, Ms. Fowler. We appreciate the 5-star review!

name: Shelby Franco
text: I absolutely love Dr. Caton! She takes the time to listen to all your issues and addresses them. I've been looking for such a doctor, I've finally found her!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words and the five-star review, Ms. Franco! We're glad to hear that Dr. Caton is the perfect physician match for you.

name: Allwrite Now
text: I saw them regularly years ago until I relocated. I’m now back in the area. I wanted to schedule an appointment with a different physician but was told they don’t allow that. So I will be searching elsewhere for a new primary care doctor (where I actually have a choice in my physician).

resp.text: Your feedback is very important to us, Ms. Fleming, and we will share this review with our leadership. Please consider calling the practice administrator so we can address your concerns directly. Our number is (256) 265-5970. Thank you.

name: Jaime Justice
text: Dr. Caton took a lot of time to talk to me and give advice. She was very pleasant and definitely listened to everything I had to say and provided thoughtful advice. Very friendly and helpful and the office is nice, as well.

resp.text: Thank you for the five-star review and the kind comments! We'll make sure Dr. Caton and the rest of the staff sees this.

name: Michael Willcutt
text: Second clinic in over six years came here hoping for better office personal an medical doctor's, first was told didn't take my insurance. name: Clayton Baswell
text:
Let me start by stating I am a business owner... very rarely do I rate business with one start however this situation more than merited this rating. If it were possible to give less stars I would do so.

I have never been treated so disparagingly or with such utter patronizing disdain from a medical provider in my entire life. Gaile Prentice CRNP (not even a medical doctor mind you) was assigned to me when I called in for a general wellness check over a year ago.  After a not so pleasant initial experience with a CRNP who was clearly not well trained or very competent for that matter I thought I'll try again when I call back next time for another appointment with another doctor. Unfortunately you are assigned the same doctor for LIFE at this practice.

This is the most absurd practice concept I have ever heard of. Instead of seeking the best doctor patient relationship this practice cares more for administrative duties and collecting as many co pays as possible.

As my wife accompanied me to my appointment literally in tears pleading for  help with managing my general anxiety we were met with ZERO SYMPATHY and were denied a refill of an very common anti anxiety medication I have used in the past on multiple occasion when it was absolutely necessary to do so (valium).

Rather than attempting to dig into the problem she exasperated the issue and the most she would do was refer me to a psychiatrist. Never mind in Texas with my  primary care doctor I was able to get prescription refills without ever having to see such a doctor. They were more than competent and experienced enough handle simple issues like these.

I was treated with contempt and my personal integrity was questioned on multiple occasion regarding a medication I have been taking literaly for years.

Do not waste your time with this practice. Do not waste your time with Gaile Prentice, she is utterly unsympathetic, contentious, and unqualified as a Certified Nurse Practitioner to act as a primary care provider.

name: gail springer
text: Worst experience ever. Went in to discuss bloodwork and explained I was having anxiety issues. She upped my anti-depression medication which did nothing for my anxiety. Told me if it didn’t help to call and they would do something else. Called twice and didn’t even get the courtesy of a return call. Guess they wanted another co-pay. Time to move on.

If you want results managing pain, I recommend the Veterans Wellness Center to anyone. The staff and the services are second to none.

name: laura biicknell
text: I highly recommend the Alabama Colon & Rectal Institute. The entire staff is professional and caring. Dr. Beckham has the best bedside manner and makes you feel totally at ease to discuss anything. He is professional yet personable, and he takes the time to listen to you and studies your medical history to determine best treatment methods. The most important thing is that I trust Dr. Beckham’s judgement, he has years of experience and extensive knowledge in this field of practice. Also, if you need to have a colonoscopy this is the place to go. My first one was done in a hospital setting it was very cold and clinical. My second one was performed here, and they made me feel comfortable and totally at ease. The only thing I dread about my next one is prep day. Colon cancer runs in my family, so it is recommended that I be tested every four years thus I am happy my primary doctor referred me to Dr. Beckham. I want to also give a shout out to Jason and Cheryl my attending nurses before and after the procedure. They made the experience much more pleasant then my first one. Shoot, I can’t name all of them but the Anesthesiologist, Dr. Logan, was great, the Nurse Anesthetist and Dr. Beckham’s attending Nurse during the procedure were also awesome. If you have a need for a gastrologist, try this place out.

He spent time with me,  answered all of my questions, and helped eased my  mind about concerns regarding my treatment. He is very thorough, so I knew I was in good hands. I would highly recommend to anyone!!

name: P A Pennington
text:
Had a 2:00 appointment and saw the doctor at 4:30. He spent no more than 5 minutes with me. Why have an appointment and show up on time when the doctor is late? There was no explanation or apology either.
While I was waiting those 2.5 hours, a woman can in who had busted her stitches. She was not treated with any sense of urgency, sympathy or kindness. The office is old and filthy. It was a wasted day because I don’t trust these people to see to my health.

resp.text:
I sincerely apologize for falling short of your expectations. Without your name or doctor, I can't address your specific situation, but I would like to discuss the unique challenges with the schedules of our very busy consulting practice. In addition to our clinic, our doctors staff 4 surrounding hospitals including ER, floor and intra-operative consults around the clock. 90% of our practice involves routine health maintenance and simple office related diseases, but the rest involves more serious issues, periodically managing life threatening conditions such as serious bleeding, infections or cancers. The concept of triage in medicine involves addressing these conditions immediately which forces  delays the rest of the day.

Also, with increasing government healthcare mandates, we must have patients complete numerous forms, especially on their first visit even for relatively small problems. These then have to be entered in our electronic medical record by our staff. This data can then be exchanged with hospitals and other doctors (primary care or referrals) to help insure patient safety and reduction in duplicated services. To reduce time in our waiting room, we recommend completing these forms online through our patient portal on our website which can then be entered into our electronic records prior to your check in.

Also I would like to address your description of our office. We take great pride in adhering to health care standards for cleaning and disinfection of our facilities. We have nightly service from a nationally recognized,  health certified cleaning company that adheres to Association for Professionals in Infection Prevention standards.

Our policy is to inform waiting patients of delays with the doctor's schedule, and this appears to be where we fell short. I have already addressed this with our staff and will reinforce this on our Policies and Procedures Manual. I welcome a constructive dialogue regarding your specific situation and hope we can achieve your trust again.

Jon D. Rosser MD, FACS, FASCRS
Medical Director
Alabama Colon and Rectal Institute, P.C.
1317 4th Avenue South
Birmingham, Alabama 35233
www.acripc.com
